put.description: Update Resource updates a resource in Guardian

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or contained invalid parameters.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to access the resource

404.description: Not Found - The requested resource was not found

500.description: Internal Server Error. Returned when theres is something wrong with Frontier server.

value.description: Actual value of duration such as 24h, 72h. value will be 0h in case of permanent duration. Valid time units are ns, us (or s). Reference: [ParseDuration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration)

question.description: Question to be asked to the appeal creator

required.description: Whether the question is required or not

description.description: The description to be shown to the appeal creator

allowFailed.description: If set true, and current step is rejected, it will mark the appeal status as skipped instead of rejected

when.description: Determines whether the step should be evaluated or it can be skipped. If it evaluates to be falsy, the step will automatically skipped. Otherwise, step become pending/blocked (normal).

strategy.description: Execution behaviour of the step. Possible values are `auto` or `manual`

approveIf.description: Determines the automatic resolution of current step when strategy is `auto`. Required when strategy is `auto`

approvers.description: List of email or Expression string. The Expression is expected to return an email address or list of email addresses. Required when strategy is `manual`

rejectionReason.description: This fills `Approval.Reason` if current approval step gets rejected based on `ApproveIf` expression. If strategy is manual, this field ignored.

provider.description: Identity manager type. Supported types are http and frontier

config.description: Client configuration according to the provider type

schema.description: User (appeal creator) profile details schema to be shown in the creator field in an appeal

on.description: Requirement trigger. If the trigger is matched, the requirement will be evaluated

providerType.description: Criteria for the provider type of the current appeal's selected resource. Regex supported

providerUrn.description: Criteria for the provider URN of the current appeal's selected resource. Regex supported

resourceType.description: Criteria for the resource type of the current appeal's selected resource. Regex supported

resourceUrn.description: Criteria for the resource URN of the current appeal's selected resource. Regex supported

role.description: Criteria for the role of the current appeal. Regex supported

action.description: Action to take on the approval. Possible values are "approve" or "reject"

reason.description: In case an appeal is rejected, the reason is to be updated in this field

providerType.description: Type of the provider that manages this resource

type.description: Type of the resource. Depends on the provider type. For example, for BigQuery, it can be dataset, table, view, etc.

details.description: Additional information of the resource that can be updated from Guardian

isDeleted.description: Whether the resource is deleted or not

guardianv1beta1Resource.title: Resource contains information of resource from providers

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

approvalId.description: Unique identifier or name of the approval

updatedAt.description: Last update time of the appeal

v1beta1Appeal.title: Appeal is created by user to get access to one or more resources

v1beta1Approval.title: Approval is an approval item that generated in an appeal based on the selected policy

accountId.description: Account ID of the user or service account who is creating the appeal

resources.description: List of resources that the user is requesting access to

accountType.description: Account type of the user or service account who is creating the appeal. For example for BigQuery and Google Cloud IAM values are "user" or "service_account"

revokedAt.description: Timestamp when the grant is revoked

updatedAt.description: Last update time of the grant
Last update time of the namespace

version.description: Policy version. Auto-incremented when policy is updated

steps.description: Sequence of approval steps. Each step can have different approval strategy and approvers
steps.title: add description

v1beta1Policy.title: Policy is a configurable steps for appeal's approval

allowPermanentAccess.description: Set this to true if you want to allow users to have permanent access to the resources. Default is false

allowActiveAccessExtensionIn.description: Duration before the access expiration date when the user allowed to create appeal to the same resource (extend their current access). Valid time units are ns, us (or s), ms, s, m, h

questions.description: List of questions to be asked to the appeal creator

updatedAt.description: Last update time of the provider

v1beta1Provider.title: Provider contains information about external data provider such as BigQuery, Metabase, etc., credentials, policy, and allowed roles

createdAt.description: Creation time of the provider activity
